Plot: A mother and daughter con team seduce and scam wealthy men.
Title: Heartbreakers
Writer: Robert Dunn, Paul Guay, Stephen Mazur
Actors: Sigourney Weaver, Jennifer Love Hewitt, Ray Liotta, Jason Lee
tomatoConsensus: Though the actors pour a lot of energy into their roles, Heartbreakers is too drawn out, and the romantic subplot doesn't blend well. Also, the con women aren't particularly sympathetic.
